channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rachel Maddow: Trump Is Quarterbacking A National GOP Crime Scandal
item.description: Rachel Maddow showed that Trump is leading the Republican Party through a national crime scandal.

item.title: Mexican Diplomat’s Dishonest Claims About Illegal Alien Law-Breaking Do Not Stand Up to Scrutiny
item.description: Mexican diplomats and politicians have a long history of lecturing Americans on illegal immigration, along with attempting to meddle in U.S. politics in ways that favor illegal aliens while undermining our border security and rule of law. To read the rest of the article click here The post Mexican Diplomat’s Dishonest Claims About Illegal Alien Law-Breaking Do Not Stand Up to Scrutiny appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com.

item.title: Democrats May Block Marjorie Taylor Greene From Ousting Mike Johnson
item.description: Rep. Adam Schiff (D-CA) said that a group of Democrats might block Rep. Majorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) from ousting Speaker Mike Johnson by not voting on the motion to vacate.

item.title: House Committee Aims to Stop Illegal Aliens from Slanting Congressional Apportionment
item.description: The House Committee on Oversight and Accountability recently approved Congressmen Chuck Edwards’ (R-N.C.) and Warren Davidson’s (R-Ohio) H.R. 7109, the Equal Representation Act. To read the rest of the article click here The post House Committee Aims to Stop Illegal Aliens from Slanting Congressional Apportionment appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com.

item.title: Nancy Pelosi Calls Out Katy Tur For Being A Trump Apologist
item.description: Former Speaker Nancy Pelosi responded to MSNBC's Katy Tur defending Trump's jobs record, by calling her a Trump apologist.

item.title: Illegal Aliens Flown to Martha’s Vineyard Classified as Victims and Given Benefits
item.description: Some of the illegal aliens that were flown from Florida to Martha’s Vineyard by Governor DeSantis in 2022 now have safe harbor from deportation and employment authorization documents allowing them to stay and work in the United States. To read the rest of the article click here The post Illegal Aliens Flown to Martha’s Vineyard Classified as Victims and Given Benefits appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com.

item.title: Hunter Biden Gives Fox News A Big New Problem
item.description: Hunter Biden's legal team is vowing to hold Fox News accountable for attacking Hunter Biden with lies for financial gain.

item.title: Clarity of Words is the Enemy of Mass Immigration Advocates
item.description: In his essay, “Politics and the English Language,” George Orwell observed that political language, by its very nature, is crafted to deceive and manipulate. He argued that politicians and propagandists deliberately twist language into falsehoods, so they become seemingly plausible statements hiding true agendas. To read the rest of the article click here The post Clarity of Words is the Enemy of Mass Immigration Advocates appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com.

item.title: Trump Kicks Kari Lake Out Of Mar-a-Lago And Worries She’s Been Taping Him
item.description: Trump gave Kari Lake the boot from Mar-a-Lago and expressed surprise that Lake taped conversations.

item.title: Italy and America: Shared Fight with Illegal Immigration
item.description: Italy has struggled with mass migration, much of it composed of fraudulent “asylum seekers” from Africa. The key route of entry is from Africa by boat, with the island of Lampedusa close to the African mainland as the primary landing point. To read the rest of the article click here The post Italy and America: Shared Fight with Illegal Immigration appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com.
